summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TaskWeaver project management platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (16/16 tests passed). Frontend functionality is mostly working with excellent AI integration. One minor issue with card creation in automated testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Card creation through prompt dialog may not be working properly in automated testing

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: User registration and login with JWT authentication
Dashboard loading and user welcome message
AI-powered task extraction from text (extracted 3 tasks successfully)
Adding extracted tasks to selected board
Navigation between all pages (dashboard, board view, inbox)
All 16 backend API endpoints working correctly
AI integration with Emergent LLM using gpt-4o-mini model

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working, minor card creation issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate card creation functionality - the prompt dialog handling might need adjustment for better user experience. Consider replacing prompt() with a proper modal dialog for card creation.
